'''''-ien''''' or '''''-iën''''' is a [[Quenya]] suffix meaning "daughter". 

==Examples==
* ''[[Lúthien#Etymology|Lúth'''ien''']]'' = "Daughter of Spells", "Enchantress"<ref>{{webcite|author=Fauskanger Helge|articleurl=https://folk.uib.no/hnohf/doriath.htm|articlename=Doriathrin Wordlist|website=Ardalambion|accessed=12/06/2021}}</ref>
* ''[[Arien#Etymology|Ar'''ien''']]'' = "Maiden of Sunlight"<ref>{{webcite|author=Fauskanger Helge|articleurl=http://www.uib.no/People/hnohf/qlist.htm|articlename=Quenya Corpus Wordlist|website=Ardalambion|accessed=12/06/2021}}</ref>

==See also==
The unrelated toponymic ending ''[[-nd|-ien]]''.
